attributes.action: Petition for all mainline Railway stations to have both disabled and pushchair access.
attributes.additional_details:
We are petitioning for all mainline stations, particuarly along the First Great Western line, to create disabled and pushchair access.

This petition has been started because of trips and falls at Cholsey station in Berkshire, many including parents with infants in pushchairs.

But all stations without access for the disabled and pushchairs are a danger, and if the government are doing an overhaul, why not put in nessesary elements?
